original_text: Whatsoever is commanded by the God of heaven, let it be diligently done for the house of the God of heaven: for why should there be wrath against the realm of the king and his sons?
korean_text: 무릇 하늘의 하나님의 전을 위하여 하늘의 하나님이 명령하신 것은 삼가 행하라 어찌하여 진노가 왕과 왕자의 나라에 임하게 하랴

sentences.original_text: Whatsoever is commanded by the God of heaven
for the house of the God of heaven
for why should there be wrath
against the realm of the king and his sons?
